title: Fort Matanzas National Monument: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           8635 A1A South  Saint Augustine, FL 32080                 Directions         Fort Matanzas is 14 miles south of Saint Augustine on State Route A1A.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         General Fort Matanzas is open every day of the year except Thanksgiving Day and Christmas Day, December 25.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Monday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Tuesday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Thursday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM   Saturday: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM             Weather           Summers are hot and humid with afternoon thundershowers. Sunscreen, a hat, UV protective sunglasses, and are recommended. Drink plenty of water. Winters are cool to mild with some cold spells, especially with wind from the north or off the water. Fall and spring are temperate with temperatures around 70F-80F (21C-26C). During danger of lightning, the fort will be closed and ferry service will be suspended. June-November is hurricane season so check for tropical storms before visiting.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Fort Matanzas Entrance Fee - $0.00 There is no fee for visiting any portion of Fort Matanzas.
